name: Madman OG
description: Another excellent hybrid from Southern California breeders Ocean Grown Genetics, Madman OG combines LA Confidential with OG Kush to create a powerful and delicious indica. Generally considered a high-THC strain, it has been tested at anywhere from 16-24%. Smooth coffee flavors give way to sour earthy undertones, with a fresh pine scent typical of many OG Kush varieties. Madman OG gives users a pleasant, relaxed body high that often leads to munchies and sleep.Â
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Happy, Tingly, Energetic, Stress, Insomnia, Depression, Pain, Headaches, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy
